DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this research study is to see if a higher strength MRI procedure provides better images to use in planning radiation treatments for patients with brain tumors in the future.
DOC.brief_title: Radiation Planning Study for High Grade Brain Tumors
DOC.criteria: Histologically confirmed, newly diagnosed Grade IIIIV glioma Planning to undergo radiation therapy Grade I or II glioma Patients unable to undergo MRI imaging
